abstract: Atlanta jury awards more than $2 million to Atlas Logistics Group Retail Services workers who were required to submit to DNA samples in effort to identify out who had been defecating in warehouse.
lead_paragraph: A jury in Atlanta awarded $2,225,000 on Monday to two warehouse workers whose employer required them to submit DNA samples in violation of the federal Genetic Information Nondiscrimination Act.

headline.main: Georgia: $2.2. Million Penalty for Illegal DNA Testing
headline.print_headline: Georgia: $2.2. Million Penalty For Illegal DNA Testing

snippet: A jury in Atlanta awarded $2,225,000 on Monday to two warehouse workers whose employer required them to submit DNA samples in violation of the federal Genetic Information Nondiscrimination Act.
